editorialSummary.text: Paint-your-own ceramics chain, with a studio available for walk-ins, workshops & parties.

originalText.text: An amazing place for a paint date! I would definitely recommend this place. My boyfriend and I went for our first time around Valentines Day. We get a discount because of a Valentines Day promotion and there were snacks, colouring pages, a station to build your own Valentines Day card, and Dunkin donuts. The decor was on theme as well. Each item ranges in price from approximately $30-50, which is reasonable considering the prep work necessary and the firing and glazing process they do after you leave. The staff were really helpful and would check on you pretty often. We can’t wait to go back soon :)

text.text: An amazing place for a paint date! I would definitely recommend this place. My boyfriend and I went for our first time around Valentines Day. We get a discount because of a Valentines Day promotion and there were snacks, colouring pages, a station to build your own Valentines Day card, and Dunkin donuts. The decor was on theme as well. Each item ranges in price from approximately $30-50, which is reasonable considering the prep work necessary and the firing and glazing process they do after you leave. The staff were really helpful and would check on you pretty often. We can’t wait to go back soon :)

originalText.text: Organised a paint event for my friend’s Baby Sprinkle and had a blast. It was so relaxing, we were allowed to stay for as long as we wanted as it wasn’t busy and the staff never asked us to leave. The price of the fees and pottery piece added up to more than I expected but tbh they need to cover the cost of the raw materials, the staff, the rent, the equipment & firing of the clay. One of the staff, May, was exceptionally helpful and friendly. The atmosphere was great, it was a fun, easy & relaxing experience - I definitely recommend it. Ps I would advise calling up and asking them to reserve a particular blank clay piece that you want to paint as certain items (simple lates/bowls) run out quickly and you have to choose from available inventory upon arrival. We were lucky to get the last few plates available!

originalText.text: Color Me Mine is a nice place for kids birthday party or a peaceful afternoon activity. My family love crafts, and there are many techniques to learn in coloring at this studio. It is a nice experience that we will enjoy and remember for years.

text.text: Color Me Mine is a nice place for kids birthday party or a peaceful afternoon activity. My family love crafts, and there are many techniques to learn in coloring at this studio. It is a nice experience that we will enjoy and remember for years.

originalText.text: Loved the experience so much! Definitely going to keep coming ☺️

text.text: Loved the experience so much! Definitely going to keep coming ☺️

originalText.text:
Wow… I’m truly at a loss for words. I spent the day here with my best friends when  one of them visited town after a long time. It was an amazing day. The time flew by quick  while we were painting and catching up. I  transported back a couple years to when we would regularly hang out every single day. When our time was coming to an end, I snapped back to reality, thinking about how we will now go back to our busy lives. Who knows when we will get to spend another special day like this together.

That’s how immersed you become at Color Me Mine when you are there with your loved ones painting and creating memories. Larisa will make it even more memorable. Her smile will brighten up your day even more and will make you want to return over and over again. Thank you so much Larisa for making our experience even more memorable with your kindness and vibrant energy!
